name: Kaso
headline: B2B platform connecting restaurants with food suppliers
description: Kaso (formerly Elkaso) is the largest B2B ordering platform for restaurants and suppliers in the Middle East. Kaso connects restaurants and suppliers, to manage and improve the order process end to end to save time, money, and food.
markdown:
raw_markdown='[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/6225e6e422a16690f4a23279_621793598e700625f2101171_Layer%2015.svg)ARE YOU A FOODIE SUPERSTAR?WE’RE HIRING!](https://www.kaso.ai/<https:/elkaso.jobs.personio.com/>)

### YOUR ORDER ISOUR CUP OF TEA.
###### We help restaurants and suppliers manage food supply orders, end to end.
We know you have a lot on your plate. That’s why we built KASO - an easy to use mobile and web app to help you streamline your operations, so you can focus on putting bread on your table!
![Order Faster and better with Kaso](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b99b1e7200e_Group%20218.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b9e8ce72001_Path%20250.svg)
###### ORDER FASTER & BETTER
**Reduce order errors** by 80% and save 2 hours of your time daily by placing all your orders in Kaso mobile app.
![ Increase your Profit with Kaso](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b8f33e71ffb_Group%20220.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b9e8ce72001_Path%20250.svg)
###### PUMP UP YOUR PROFITS
Save money from managing your digital catalogs, down to getting the best payment terms.
![ Avoid the waste with Kaso](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b225de72002_Group%20215.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b9e8ce72001_Path%20250.svg)
###### DISH OUT THE WASTE
Avoid 20% of waste thanks to KASO advanced analytical tools.
[SIGN UP NOW](https://www.kaso.ai/<#form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b4c41e720c7_Homepage-02.svg)
![Restaurant Supply Management Tool](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b9d59e72097_Pic1-01.png)
LEARN MOREABOUT KASO
for
Restaurants
No more messy Whatsapp messages, incorrect or delayed orders! All your orders in one platform, with a marketplace of suppliers to choose from, and a support team whenever you need us. Efficiency never tasted so sweet!
[LEARN MORE!](https://www.kaso.ai/</restaurants>)
MANAGE ALLYOUR PURCHASESIN ONE APP!
[LEARN MORE!](https://www.kaso.ai/</restaurants>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b304be720ca_Homepage-03.svg)

for
SUPPLIERS
All your items and orders - organized, accurate, and in one place. Save more by automatizing your processes. Sell more by accessing new restaurants. The cherry on the cake - get paid in advance with our unique credit facilities!
[LEARN MORE!](https://www.kaso.ai/</suppliers>)
![vendors for restaurants](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979bef34e72098_Pic2-001.png)
Save time in order processing & get new leads!
[LEARN MORE!](https://www.kaso.ai/</restaurants>)

### YOUR ORDER ISOUR CUP OF TEA.
###### We help restaurants and suppliers manage food supply orders, end to end.
We know you have a lot on your plate. That’s why we built KASO - an easy to use mobile and web app to help you streamline your operations, so you can focus on putting bread on your table!
![Order Faster and better with Kaso⟨13⟩]![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b9e8ce72001_Path%20250.svg)
###### ORDER FASTER & BETTER
**Reduce order errors** by 80% and save 2 hours of your time daily by placing all your orders in Kaso mobile app.
![ Increase your Profit with Kaso⟨14⟩]![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b9e8ce72001_Path%20250.svg)
###### PUMP UP YOUR PROFITS
Save money from managing your digital catalogs, down to getting the best payment terms.
![ Avoid the waste with Kaso⟨15⟩]![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62109e41c7979b6f0be71ff1/62109e41c7979b9e8ce72001_Path%20250.svg)
###### DISH OUT THE WASTE
Avoid 20% of waste thanks to KASO advanced analytical tools.

generated_description:
Kaso, which started its journey as Elkaso, is redefining the B2B landscape for restaurants and food suppliers in the Middle East. Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator Batch W22, Kaso operates out of the United Arab Emirates and has quickly become the largest ordering platform in its niche. The core mission? To connect restaurants with suppliers to streamline the order process end-to-end, ultimately saving time, reducing costs, and minimizing food waste.

With a talented team of 50, Kaso is not just another marketplace; it's a crucial tool for modern food businesses. The platform takes the hassle out of managing supply orders, replacing convoluted communication methods (think messy WhatsApp threads) with a comprehensive mobile and web application that consolidates everything into one place. It’s designed to help businesses place orders more accurately and efficiently, cutting order errors by up to 80% and saving an average of two hours daily.

Kaso's impact extends beyond operational efficiency. By utilizing advanced analytical tools, the platform also helps users reduce waste by approximately 20%, which is a substantial benefit in an industry where margins can be thin.

The company is backed by notable investors, including Tom Blomfield as a Group Partner, and has established a significant presence with over 5000 partners already using the service. Kaso's marketplace not only benefits restaurants by providing a range of suppliers to choose from but also empowers suppliers by automating processes and giving them access to new customers—all while ensuring timely payments through their unique credit facilities.

In short, Kaso is more than just software; it's a game-changer for the food industry in the region, and as it continually expands, it's set to revolutionize supply chain management in restaurants. If you're involved in the food business, you should definitely check them out at [kaso.ai](https://www.kaso.ai). Ready to save time and money? Kaso makes getting started easy, so why not dive in?
